issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
This is a show stopper bug.  Please see for details here: http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/177786/titanium-studio-34-rc-cant-see-the-ios-8-sdk

iOS 8 is out and people or switching to it in thousands.  We need to get our app into the store but unfortunately tTitanium studio and SDK are not ready for it.
fields.summary: Titanium Studio 3.4 RC can't see the iOS 8 SDK
fields.environment:
MAC OS X Yosemite Beta 10.10
Xcode 6.1
Titanium Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409161931

comments.body:
Hi,

Titanium Studio has been deprecated. You can use the Appcelerator Studio instead. Please follow the instructions here[http://web.appcelerator.com/tools] to download the latest Appcelerator studio.
